title: How to Prepare Potato Onion Dry

steps.headline: Peel the potatoes and onions and chop into small pieces.
Chop the chilies,coriander, and peeled garlic cloves.
Take a bowl and mix salt, pepper, chilli powder, and rice powder and mix it thoroughly.
Light the stove and put the Tava (frying pan) on the stove.
steps.description: Add 1 tablespoon of oil to heat.

steps.headline: Coat the potato pieces in the bowl of pepper, chili and rice powder.
Add the coated pieces of potato to the Tava and cook by gently stirring with a wooden spoon to ensure all the potato is cooked in the oil.
Turn down the heat and sprinkle the water onto the potatoes and place the lid on the Tava to continue cooking the potatoes.
Place another Tava onto the burner and add 1 tablespoon of oil to heat.
Add coriander, onion, chilies, and garlic.
steps.description: Give it a quick mix. Wait until it fries completely.

steps.headline: Remove the cooked potatoes from the Tava making sure that you drain any excess cooking oil and place into a large mixing bowl.
Drain off any cooking oil and add the cooked onion, chilies and garlic to the bowl containing the potatoes and gently mix together
Add soya sauce and tomato ketchup for taste.
Garnish it with spinach or mint leaves.

text: Wash all the vegetables.  Peel the potatoes and onions and chop into small pieces.  Chop the chilies,coriander, and peeled garlic cloves.  Take a bowl and mix salt, pepper, chilli powder, and rice powder and mix it thoroughly.  Light the stove and put the Tava (frying pan) on the stove. Add 1 tablespoon of oil to heat. Coat the potato pieces in the bowl of pepper, chili and rice powder.  Add the coated pieces of potato to the Tava and cook by gently stirring with a wooden spoon to ensure all the potato is cooked in the oil.  Turn down the heat and sprinkle the water onto the potatoes and place the lid on the Tava to continue cooking the potatoes.  Place another Tava onto the burner and add 1 tablespoon of oil to heat.  Add coriander, onion, chilies, and garlic. Give it a quick mix. Wait until it fries completely. Remove the cooked potatoes from the Tava making sure that you drain any excess cooking oil and place into a large mixing bowl.  Drain off any cooking oil and add the cooked onion, chilies and garlic to the bowl containing the potatoes and gently mix together  Add soya sauce and tomato ketchup for taste.  Garnish it with spinach or mint leaves.  Serve onto plates.
